question: [File: aptos-core/consensus/safety-rules/src/safety_rules_manager.rs] [Function: client()] [Consensus to SafetyRules message validation] When consensus calls client methods, are messages properly validated, or can malformed consensus messages exploit safety rules parsing vulnerabilities?
